data.title: Empty restaurant
data.text: We went on a weekend evening and it was quite empty.  Food was mediocre and wasn't really impressed with the service either.

data.title: spendy but tasty
data.text: I was eating alone and the dishes were quite expensive, sort of like this was meant for very special occasions or business parties. The a la carte menu is somewhat more affordable and I tried the seafood pancake, a kind of comfort food. I was full after the pan-chan (small vegetable dishes) and just about 1/3 of the pancake. The batter is good, unlike anything I tasted before, and there was plenty of seafood. recommend.
